scripts.test: docker system prune -f; npm run build; docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d
scripts.stop-test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down; docker system prune -f
scripts.build: npm run build-back-end; npm run build-front-end
scripts.build-rpi: npm run build-back-end-rpi; npm run build-front-end-rpi
